professorData.name: Prof. Yoonjin Yoon
professorData.greeting: Associate Professor in Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering at KAIST with joint appointment in Graduate School of Artificial Intelligence and Graduate School of Data Science
edu: M.S. Management Science and Engineering, Stanford
Ph.D. Civil and Environmental Engineering, UC Berkeley
professorData.research: Coming from Mathematics, Computer Science, Management Science, and Civil engineering background, my research focus is system-of-systems, which includes transportation system, city, logistics system, and public health system.
